What is Hacksyke?

Welcome to Hacksyke 2.0—the evolution of CodeQuestt. Bigger, bolder, and chaotic in the best way. This isn't just a hackathon. It's India's first full-blown hackathon franchise, starting with an insane 48-hour hybrid showdown in the heart of India's tech capital.

For Everyone

Whether you're a coder, designer, product nerd, or someone who just likes to break stuff and build it back better—this is for you.

Accessible

₹900 offline / Free online with perks including food, swag, Wi-Fi, chaos, and community.

Chaotic Energy

Build anything. Break stuff. Sleep later. Hacksyke is all about the vibe: chaotic, creative, and community-driven.

Cultural Shift

Our goal is to change India's youth culture, one hackathon at a time, creating a community of builders and innovators.

Event Format

Dates & Time

Friday, July 17 (6 PM) to Sunday, July 19 (6 PM), 2026

A full 48 hours of coding, creating, and collaborating in a high-energy environment.

Location

Offline

Bangalore tech hub (venue TBD - targeting premium tech spaces)

Online

Accessible from anywhere in India via our custom virtual hackathon platform

Participation

Offline

100 hackers on-site, experiencing the full energy of in-person collaboration

Online

200+ wild coders from across India, connected through our digital platform

Registration Fee

Offline

₹900 (includes everything: food, swag, Wi-Fi, floor space for sleeping)

Online

FREE (thanks to the internet gods and our awesome sponsors)

Why Join Hacksyke?

There are countless reasons to be part of this revolution. Here are just a few.

48 hours of madness

No sleep, all code. Push your limits and see what you can build under pressure.

₹1L+ prize pool

Win swag, mentorships, startup intros, and recognition for your innovation.

Startup & mentor network

Rub shoulders with India's best tech minds and industry leaders.

Insane ideas

Build anything—apps, games, tools, hacks. Your imagination is the only limit.

Coder cred

Be part of India's youth hack culture and build your reputation.

Lifetime community access

Join the Hacksyke Hub and stay connected with fellow hackers year-round.

"Build anything. Break stuff. Sleep later."

That's the Hacksyke promise. Join us for an unforgettable weekend of creation, chaos, and community.

Hacksyke Hub

Launching August 2026 - Your new online home post-hackathon.

What is the Hub?

Hacksyke Hub is more than just a Discord server. It's a year-round community for coders, designers, and builders to stay connected, learn, and grow together.

Who can join?

All participants + open invites

Launch Date

August 2026

Goal

1,000 members by July 2027

Press 1 if you're hacking.

Mini-hacks

Monthly 4-hour creative chaos sessions to keep your skills sharp

Mentor AMAs

Talks with startup founders, developers, and tech rebels

Project Channels

Collaborate, get feedback, and ship your projects with community support

Job Board

Gig and internship opportunities from our startup partners

Hack Leaderboards

Compete for most savage bugs, funniest commits, and more

Swag Drops

Win shirts, stickers, mugs, and meme-gear through regular contests

Cost to Join

FREE

The Hacksyke Hub is a community initiative to foster connections and creativity beyond the hackathon event itself.
